column4: under the add window, make sure you select something for "calendar" to be published
(the first tab that comes up) you must select a publishing source (the second tab is for destination)
I've selected one of my calendars.. still nothing.
I tried the default "Personal" first, that didn't work, I created a new Calanedar to try.  Still grayed out.
you select webdav, put a server name, and a file name, and OK doesn't become available? on mine i only have to provide those three to get an ok (after selecting a source calendar)
correct
What do you have as your server name?
I have tried http://server.com/dav, http://server.com , server.com
Still always grayed out.
i can type anything...i tried several text strings (including obviously illegal ones)
I have all the optional information filled out as well.  Still nothing.
I have publish as iCal and Pub Freq as Daily although I have tried every other combination without success.
Do I have to have some other app or plugin installed that I don't know about?
i'll check my plugins, but it is all defaults (i even just tried using all spaces for server and file and OK becomes available on my end)

so frustrating.  I'm trying to get everything the way I would need it to be on an old computer before I permanently switch from WinXP to Ubuntu, and Evolution is a major part cause as of now I can't live without Outlook
unfortunately, i am unable to break my calendar at all to replicate the issue
hmm.. I'm not sure where else to go with this. I can't find anything on google ubuntu's forums.
I'm an idiot.
